TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EncryptedXml extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示用于实现 XML 加密的进程模型。

span.span: Represents the process model for implementing XML encryption.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是用于 .NET Framework 中的 XML 加密的主类。The class is the main class used for XML encryption in the .NET Framework. XML 加密是一种基于标准的、可互操作的方式，用于加密 XML 文档或任何任意数据的全部或部分。XML Encryption is a standards-based, interoperable way to encrypt all or part of an XML document or any arbitrary data. .NET Framework XML 加密类实现万维网联合会（W3C） [Xml 加密语法和处理版本 1.1](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/)规范。The .NET Framework XML encryption classes implement the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [XML Encryption Syntax and Processing Version 1.1](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/) specification. 只要需要以标准方式在应用程序或组织之间共享加密的 XML 数据，就可以使用 类。Use the class whenever you need to share encrypted XML data between applications or organizations in a standard way. 使用此类加密的任何数据都可以通过任何针对 XML 加密的 W3C 规范实现进行解密。Any data encrypted using this class can be decrypted by any implementation of the W3C specification for XML encryption. XML 加密将任何纯文本 XML 元素或文档替换为 `` 元素，该元素包含纯文本 XML 或任意数据的加密（或密码文本）表示形式。XML encryption replaces any plain text XML element or document with the `` element, which contains an encrypted (or cipher text) representation of plain text XML or any arbitrary data. `` 元素可以选择包含有关在何处查找将解密密码文本的密钥的信息，以及使用哪种加密算法来加密纯文本。The `` element can optionally contain information about where to find a key that will decrypt the cipher text, and which cryptographic algorithm was used to encrypt the plain text. `` 元素类似于 style 和用法中的 `` 元素，只是它允许你对将解密 `` 元素值的密钥进行加密。The `` element is similar to the `` element in style and usage, except that it allows you to encrypt a key that will decrypt the value of the `` element. 请注意，`` 元素和 `` 元素永远不会包含未加密的密钥。Note that the `` element and the `` element will never contain an unencrypted key. 使用以下方法之一来交换密钥信息：Use one of the following methods to exchange key information: - 不要包含任何密钥信息。Do not include any key information. 如果选择此选项，双方必须同意算法和密钥，才能交换加密的数据。If you choose this option, both parties must agree on an algorithm and key before they exchange encrypted data. - 在 `` 元素的统一资源标识符（URI）属性中包含密钥的位置。Include the location of the key in the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) attribute of the `` element. 双方必须预先同意密钥位置，并且此位置必须是保密的。Both parties must agree on the key location ahead of time and this location must be kept secret. - 包含映射到 `` 元素中的键的字符串名称。Include a string name that maps to a key in the `` element. 双方必须同意密钥名称映射，然后才能交换加密数据，并且必须将此映射保密。Both parties must agree on the key name mapping before they exchange encrypted data and this mapping must be kept secret. - 在 `` 元素中包含加密密钥。Include an encrypted key in the `` element. 双方必须同意密钥，以便在交换加密的数据之前对加密密钥进行解密。Both parties must agree on the key that decrypts the encrypted key before they exchange encrypted data. 你可以选择性地包含密钥的名称或位置，将解密 `` 元素中的密钥。You can optionally include a name or location of the key that will decrypt the key in the `` element. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个使用 算法对 XML 文档进行加密的简单实用工具类。The following code example demonstrates how to create a simple utility class that uses the algorithm to encrypt an XML document. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.XML.MainXMLEncDecryptDataOOP#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.MainXMLEncDecryptDataOOP/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.MainXMLEncDecryptDataOOP#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.MainXMLEncDecryptDataOOP/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.MainXMLEncDecryptDataOOP#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.MainXMLEncDecryptDataOOP/VB/sample.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用对称密钥加密 XML 文档。The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt an XML document using a symmetric key. 此示例不包括加密的 XML 文档中的任何关键信息。This example does not include any key information in the encrypted XML document. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMinimalDecryptData#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMinimalDecryptData/CPP/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMinimalDecryptData.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMinimalDecryptData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMinimalDecryptData/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMinimalDecryptData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMinimalDecryptData/VB/sample.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用对称密钥加密 XML 文档。The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt an XML document using a symmetric key. 此示例将一个密钥名称嵌入到加密的 XML 文档中，解密方法使用它来查找适当的解密密钥。This example embeds a key name in the encrypted XML document that the decrypting method uses to find the appropriate decryption key. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey/CPP/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey/VB/sample.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用非对称密钥加密 XML 文档。The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt an XML document using an asymmetric key. 此示例创建一个对称会话密钥以加密文档，然后使用非对称密钥将会话密钥的加密版本嵌入到 XML 文档中。This example creates a symmetric session key to encrypt the document and then uses the asymmetric key to embed an encrypted version of the session key into the XML document. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey/VB/sample.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 x.509 证书加密 XML 文档。The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt an XML document using an X.509 certificate. 此示例创建一个对称会话密钥以加密文档，然后使用 x.509 证书将会话密钥的加密版本嵌入到 XML 文档中。This example creates a symmetric session key to encrypt the document and then uses the X.509 certificate to embed an encrypted version of the session key into the XML document. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKeyX509#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKeyX509/CPP/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKeyX509.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKeyX509#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKeyX509/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKeyX509#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKeyX509/VB/sample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法，使用对称密钥解密 元素。Use the method to decrypt an element using a symmetric key. 请注意， 方法仅解密顶级 `` 标记。Note that the method only decrypts top-level `` tags. 如果一个或多个 `` 标记已加密，并且包含在较高级别的 `` 标记中，则可以为每个标记单独调用 方法。In cases where one or more `` tags have been encrypted and are contained within higher level `` tags, you can call the method separately for each one. 有关代码示例，请参阅 方法。See the method for a code example. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用对称密钥加密 XML 文档。The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt an XML document using a symmetric key. 此示例不包括加密的 XML 文档中的任何关键信息。This example does not include any key information in the encrypted XML document. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法解密在初始化过程中加载的 XML 文档的所有 `` 元素。The method decrypts all `` elements of the XML document loaded during initialization. 调用此方法后，文档中的所有 `` 元素都将替换为纯文本版本。After you call this method, all `` elements in the document are replaced with plain text versions. 方法仅解密顶级 `` 元素。The method decrypts only top-level `` elements. 如果需要解密超加密文档（一次加密的文档），必须反复调用 方法，直到所有 `` 元素都已解密。If you need to decrypt a super-encrypted document (a document that is encrypted more than once), you must call the method repeatedly until all the `` elements have been decrypted. > [!NOTE] > 方法仅解密有效的 XML 数据。The method decrypts only valid XML data. 若要解密任意数据，请使用 方法。To decrypt arbitrary data, use the method. 若要将 XML 加密用于 x.509 证书，你必须安装 Microsoft 增强的加密提供程序，并且 x.509 证书必须使用增强的提供程序。To use XML Encryption with X.509 certificates, you must have the Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider installed and the X.509 certificate must use the Enhanced Provider. 如果未安装 Microsoft 增强的加密提供程序，或者 x.509 证书未使用增强的提供程序，则在对 XML 文档进行解密时将会引发 "未知错误" 的 。If you do not have the Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider installed or the X.509 certificate does not use the Enhanced Provider, a with an "Unknown Error" will be thrown when you decrypt an XML document. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用非对称密钥加密 XML 文档。The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt an XML document using an asymmetric key. 此示例创建一个对称会话密钥以加密文档，然后使用非对称密钥将会话密钥的加密版本嵌入到 XML 文档中。This example creates a symmetric session key to encrypt the document and then uses the asymmetric key to embed an encrypted version of the session key into the XML document. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey/VB/sample.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 x.509 证书加密 XML 文档。The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt an XML document using an X.509 certificate. 此示例创建一个对称会话密钥以加密文档，然后使用 x.509 证书将会话密钥的加密版本嵌入到 XML 文档中。This example creates a symmetric session key to encrypt the document and then uses the X.509 certificate to embed an encrypted version of the session key into the XML document. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKeyX509#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKeyX509/CPP/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKeyX509.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKeyX509#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKeyX509/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKeyX509#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKeyX509/VB/sample.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何解密包含另一个加密 `` 标记的高级 `` 标记。The following code example demonstrates how to decrypt a high level `` tag that contains another encrypted `` tag. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是使用证书对元素的外部 XML 进行加密的一种简便方法。The method is a convenient way to encrypt the outer XML of an element using a certificate. 此方法生成256位高级加密标准（AES）会话密钥来加密 XML 元素，然后使用 对象对 AES 密钥进行加密和签名。This method generates a 256-bit Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) session key to encrypt an XML element and then encrypts and signs the AES key using the object. 然后 方法将生成的 XML 作为 元素返回。The method then returns the resulting XML as an element. 如果需要对加密进行更多的控制，则可以将加密信息放入 `` 元素中，或者指定是要加密整个 XML 元素还是仅加密其内容，使用 方法重载。If you need more control over the encryption, so you can place the encrypted information into a `` element or specify whether the entire XML element or just its contents should be encrypted, use the method overloads. 若要将 XML 加密用于 x.509 证书，你必须安装 Microsoft 增强的加密提供程序，并且 x.509 证书必须使用增强的提供程序。To use XML Encryption with X.509 certificates, you must have the Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider installed and the X.509 certificate must use the Enhanced Provider. 如果未安装 Microsoft 增强的加密提供程序，或者 x.509 证书未使用增强的提供程序，则在对 XML 文档进行解密时将会引发 "未知错误" 的 。If you do not have the Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider installed or the X.509 certificate does not use the Enhanced Provider, a with an "Unknown Error" will be thrown when you decrypt an XML document. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 x.509 证书加密 XML 文档。The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt an XML document using an X.509 certificate. 此示例创建一个对称会话密钥以加密文档，然后使用 x.509 证书将会话密钥的加密版本嵌入到 XML 文档中。This example creates a symmetric session key to encrypt the document and then uses the X.509 certificate to embed an encrypted version of the session key into the XML document.
